title: A chhuak malsawmna tam kalvariah
lyrics:
A chhuak,
Malsawmna tam Kalvari-ah,
Chhandamtu a thih avangin;
A hausakna a tawp lo va,
Tunah tlemin a tla rih thin;
Ruahpuiin a lo la sur ang.

Nunna
Leh nawmna kin ngaii tawh lo kha,
A hnenah kan chang reng ang a;
Chatuanin lawm tak leh hlimin,
A mi thianghlimte kan pawl ang,
Kalvari hnehna fak fovin.

Tah chuan
Mitthi ngaih te, tah te, nat te,
Lungngaih, thlaphan, mangan a reh;
Riltam, tuihal a awm tawh lo,
Chhandamtu hovin an hlim fo,
A nawm sawi hleih theihh loh changin.
